actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Mickey Edwards at Los Angeles, California.

summary.text: Authorizes the Speaker of the House to administer the oath of office to Representative-elect Mickey Edwards at Los Angeles, California.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Mickey Edwards at Los Angeles, California.
